description: Advances from a bustling town to a veritable metropolis, full of the wonders of modern technology.
tooltip: Advance to the Empire Phase, which unlocks more entities and technologies. Civic Centers +25% territory influence radius. Structures +1 capture points regeneration rate for garrisoned units.  Civ Center 40% more garrison capacity and 5 more range. Spartiates cost 20 more metal/wood and take 10% longer to train but gain 25 health, 15%hack/pierce dmg and all infantry +0.5H/P Resistance.
